name: tsimporter
description: Automatically searches for TypeScript definitions in workspace files and provides all known symbols as completion item to allow code completion.

commands.title: Dumps index to a new document

tsimporter.filesToScan.description: Glob for files to watch and scan, e.g ./src/** ./src/app/**/*.ts. Defaults to [**/*.ts,**/*.tsx]

tsimporter.filesToExclude.description: Glob for files to exclude from watch and scan, e.g ./out/**. Defaults to nothing

tsimporter.disabled.description: Extension is disabled when set to true

tsimporter.noStatusBar.description: Disables the status bar of this extension

tsimporter.doubleQuotes.description: Specifies wether to use double quotes

tsimporter.spaceBetweenBraces.description: Insert spaces between the import braces. ( import {test} from 'test' vs. import { test } from 'test' )

tsimporter.removeFileExtensions.description: File Extensions to remove. default is '.d.ts,.ts,.tsx'

tsimporter.lowImportance.description: If true, the code completion items will be sorted back to the build in completion items

tsimporter.emitSemicolon.description: If false, no semicolon will be written

tsimporter.preferRelative.description: When true shorter relative imports will be be prefered instead of absolute imports
